# Gene set enrichment

## CR&CRi vs OR&NR

```{r}
dotplot(Gene_set_diff_analysis[["CR_vs_OR"]], showCategory=10, split=".sign") + facet_grid(.~.sign)
```


## NR vs R

```{r}
png("../Results/NR_vs_R_Geneset.png", width = 720, height = 720*9/16)
dotplot(Gene_set_diff_analysis[["NR_vs_R"]], showCategory=10, split=".sign") + facet_grid(.~.sign)
dev.off()
```



## NR vs R (without RUNX1m)

```{r}
dotplot(Gene_set_diff_analysis[["NR_vs_R_without_RUNX1m"]], showCategory=10, split=".sign") + facet_grid(.~.sign)
```

## RUNX1m vs RUNX1 wt

```{r}
dotplot(Gene_set_diff_analysis[["RUNX1wt_vs_RUNX1m"]], showCategory=10, split=".sign") + facet_grid(.~.sign)
gseaplot(Gene_set_diff_analysis[["RUNX1wt_vs_RUNX1m"]], by = "all", title = Gene_set_diff_analysis[["RUNX1wt_vs_RUNX1m"]]$Description[155], geneSetID = 155)
```
